3.0 I20040413

A NPE is thrown and the view title is not cleared when you clear the history of
the new search (search2).  org.eclipse.search2.internal.ui.SearchView shoule
check for a null search before setting the title.

testing is simple.
1. Run a search in the new search view (or have an existing result)
2. Run the Clear History action.
Observe: The title is not cleared


in updateTitle(ISearchResult)
change:
setTitle(search.getLabel());
to be:
setTitle(search!=null?search.getLabel():"");
(or something similar)
